characterList: 賽毒素青精請情睛清靜責績積表錶生星姓性害割慧豐春泰奉棒勤謹僅漢難攤華嘩垂錘

characters.story: The shellfish stands for competition, shouting "Sai!" sharply!
The strokes unite to show a poison, asking "Doo? Venom?" curiously!
"Soo!" Ten threads commanded sharply at the table - a plain vegetarian diet, meatless!
The moon takes the shape of blue or green, singing "Ching!" cheerfully!
A striking symbol for refined that sings "Jing!" cheerfully!
The strokes unite to show to invite, whispering "Ching" softly!
See how the heart forms feelings? It asks "Ching? Emotion?" curiously!
See how the eye forms eyeball? It sings "Jing!" cheerfully - a vivid image to remember!
See how the water forms pure? It sings "Ching!" cheerfully like ripples spreading across a pond!
A striking symbol for quiet that shouts "Jing!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
See how the shellfish forms responsibility? It asks "Dzuh? Duty?" curiously!
The thread stands for accomplishments, shouting "Jee!" sharply!
The strokes unite to show to accumulate, singing "Jee!" cheerfully!
A striking symbol for surface that whispers "Byao" softly - a vivid image to remember!
The metal stands for a watch, whispering "Byao" softly - a vivid image to remember!
"Shung!" Life sprouted from soil cheerfully - to be born!
Like a sun, this character means star and sings "Shing!" as sunlight streams across the sky!
A striking symbol for surname that shouts "Shing!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
The heart takes the shape of sex, shouting "Shing!" sharply!
See how the mouth forms harm? It shouts "Hi!" sharply spoken through parted lips!
The sword takes the shape of to cut off, singing "Guh!" cheerfully!
The heart takes the shape of intelligent, shouting "Hway!" sharply!
This character represents plentiful, singing "Fung!" cheerfully!
"Choon!" The sun warmed three people cheerfully - springtime, the festive season!
"Tie!" Water and big hands commanded sharply - tranquil, peaceful and safe!
The strokes unite to show to proffer, shouting "Fung!" sharply!
The tree and stick unite to create cudgel, shouting "Bahng!" sharply!
This character represents diligent, asking "Chin? Working?" curiously!
A striking symbol for careful that whispers "Jin" softly - a vivid image to remember!
The person takes the shape of merely, whispering "Jin" softly!
The water takes the shape of han, shouting "Hahn!" sharply like ripples spreading across a pond!
Picture difficult taking form - it asks "Nahn? Arduous?" with vivid energy!
Like a hand, this character means vendor's stand and calls "Tahn"!
The strokes unite to show splendor, asking "Hwah? Magnificent?" curiously!
The mouth takes the shape of clamor, asking "Hwah? Noise?" curiously!
"Chway, is it hanging?" The cliff questioned ground curiously - drooping and dangling down!
The metal takes the shape of hammer, asking "Chway? Spindle?" curiously!
